result.html: d'íoc muid as an óstánWe paid for the hotel.

result.eng: We prefer staying in hostels then in hotels.
result.ga: is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin
result.orig: Is fearr linn fanacht i mbrúnna ná in óstáin

result.eng: I hate camping, I prefer hotels.
result.ga: is fuath liom bheith ag campáil is fearr liom óstáin

result.eng: The hotel looks good, let's book it.

result.eng: It's on Friday night, over in the hotel.

result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ga: tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
